examples:
QUERY (\x xs -> if length xs > 20 then xs else if (personBrowserUsed x == "Safari" && gender x == "female" && lastName x == "Li") then x:xs else xs)
FROM persons
TO relational

QUERY (\x xs -> if totalprice(order x ) > 2100.00 then (order x):xs else xs)
FROM invoices
TO xml

QUERY (\vertex newGraph -> let person = vertexValue vertex in if firstName person == "Li" && lastName person == "Li" then addVertex vertex newGraph else newGraph)
FROM personKnowsPersonGraph
TO nimblegraph

LET t BE
QUERY (\vertex newGraph -> let person = vertexValue vertex in if personsId person == 26388279076888 then addVertex vertex newGraph else newGraph)
FROM personKnowsPersonGraph
TO nimblegraph
IN
QUERY (\vertex newGraph -> inComingNeighbors vertex personKnowsPersonGraph)
FROM t
TO nimblegraph

QUERY (\vertex newGraph -> case (vertexValue vertex) of Right(person) -> if firstName person == "Ning" then addVertex vertex newGraph else newGraph; Left(post) -> if postId post == 1649267452025 then addVertex vertex newGraph else newGraph)
FROM personCreatedPostGraph
TO nimblegraph

LET t BE
QUERY (\v g -> case (vertexValue v) of Right(person) -> g; Left(post) -> if isInfixOf "tennis" (content post) then addVertex v g else g)
FROM personCreatedPostGraph
TO nimblegraph
IN
QUERY (\v g -> nimbleGraphUnion (outGoingNeighbors v personCreatedPostGraph) g)
FROM t
AS nimblegraph
TO nimblegraph

QUERY (\vertex newGraph -> case (vertexValue vertex) of Left(person) -> newGraph; Right(product) -> if unibenchProductId product == 5604 then nimbleGraphUnion (inComingNeighbors vertex personToProductGraph) newGraph else newGraph)
FROM personToProductGraph
TO nimblegraph

QUERY (\x xs -> if totalprice(x) > 3500.00 then x:xs else xs)
FROM unibenchOrders
TO json

QUERY (\x xs ->if length xs > 0 then if unibenchProductPrice(xs !! 0) < unibenchProductPrice x then [x] else xs else [x])
FROM unibenchProducts
TO relational

LET t BE
QUERY (\x xs -> if orderid x == "aeafd60c-8e60-4daf-9136-d3714911bde7" then x:xs else xs)
FROM unibenchOrders
TO relational
IN
QUERY (\x xs ->(orderedBy x persons):xs)
FROM t
AS relational
TO relational

QUERY (\x xs -> if totalprice(x) > 3500.00 then Connect (Vertex (orderid(x), orderdate(x))) xs else xs)
FROM unibenchOrders
TO graph

QUERY (\x xs -> if length xs > 40 then xs else orderline(order x) ++ xs)
FROM invoices
TO relational
